coding with spice ¤ by nick quaranto

RailsConf 2009 Notes

published 05 May 2009

I’ll be doing liveblogging of the conference talks that I attend this year. This page will be updated throughout the week with links to the notes. Stay tuned!

Day One

  • DHH Keynote: The real secret to Rails Productivity
  • A morning with GitHub
  • Rails is From Mars, Ruby is From Venus
  • The Future of Deployment
  • Smacking Git Around
  • Guitar Hero Behind the Music

Day Two

  • Chris Wansrath Keynote: Reducing Friction
  • Getting to know Ruby 1.9
  • Rails 3 Step off of the Golden Path
  • What Makes Ruby Go: An Implementation Primer
  • Working Effectively with Legacy Rails
  • Starting Up Fast: Lessons from the Rails Rumble
  • Robert Martin Keynote: What killed Smalltalk could kill Ruby too

Day Three

  • Webrat: Rails Testing Evolved
  • And the Greatest of these is…Rack support
  • Automated Code Quality Checking in Ruby and Rails
